description: Bridges: Method `addInfoMessage()` must have `public function create<DomainEntity>Collection(<DomainEntity>CollectionRequestTransfer): <DomainEntity>CollectionResponseTransfer` signature.
Bridges: Method `getProductAbstractIdsByProductConcreteIds()` must have `public function get<DomainEntity>Collection(<DomainEntity>CriteriaTransfer): <DomainEntity>CollectionTransfer` signature.
Bridges: Type should be defined for param `value` in method `Spryker\Zed\ProductList\Dependency\Service\ProductListToUtilTextServiceBridge::generateSlug()`.
